message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $9000. How about we meet in the middle at $11000?
I'm still very interested in the product, but $11000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $9500. How about we compromise at $12500?
I'm starting to think that $12500 is a bit too rich for my blood. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. However, $10000 is still a bit below my target. How about we meet at $13000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500 again?
I'm not willing to go back to $9500, Bob. That's below my minimum. How about we meet at $12000?
I'm really close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to make one last offer of $9000. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to go with John's offer of $15000.
